class CTreeNodeFactory

Detailed Description

Representation of a binary arithmetic expression. Used by both the front and middle-end although when this node appears in the ME onwards it will be in MIR form.

Children:
   0. LHS of the expression
   1. RHS of the expression

Member Function Documentation

TokenType CArithExprTreeNode::DetermineTempVarType ( CTreeNode *  Lhs  )  [private]

Looks at the LHS of the expression to determine it's type.

Parameters:
Lhs Left hand side of the expression.
Returns:
The type of the LHS used to create the temp variable holding the result of this expression.

CTreeNode * CArithExprTreeNode::RewriteIntoMIRForm ( CTreeNode *  Stmts  )  [virtual]

Inherited from CTreeNode. If either operand of the expression is itself another expression, perform the necessary simplification by breaking it down into smaller expressions using compiler generated temporary variables.

Implements CTreeNode.
